staxel.village.character.dialogue.FarmFa: Thanks again for all the birthday stuff, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
You really have no idea how much it means...
It's so nice to have found a real friend again.
There aren't many people who love farming as much as I do.
No one really says it, but everyone around here thinks I'm weird.
